sentences.sContent: Phil had several unsettling dreams every night.
sentences.sCn: 菲尔每晚都做好几个令他不安的梦。

synos.tran: 使人不安的；（消息）扰乱的

remMethod.val: 来自unsettle(v. 使不安宁， 扰乱)

trans.tranCn: 使人不安的， 扰乱的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as unsettling, you mean that it makes you feel worried or uncertain
